findings.reasoning: The function sendToWinner_unchk40 sends 42 ether without validating the address. If addr_unchk40 is null or invalid, this will cause an error.
The function bug_unchk37 does not check if addr_unchk37 exists before sending. This can cause an error if the address is null or invalid.
The function bug_unchk46 sends 5 ether without validating addr_unchk46. This can lead to errors if the address is null or invalid.
The deposit() function does not validate if msg.sender exists in the token array. This can cause errors when trying to add tokens from a non-existent address.
The function bug_unchk7 does not check if addr_unchk7 exists before sending. This can cause an error if the address is null or invalid.
The function bug_unchk14 sends 5 ether without validating addr. This can lead to errors if the address is null or invalid.
The function my_func_uncheck36 sends a message without validating the recipient address. This can cause errors if the address is null or invalid.
